Hi !

Since upgrading from 0.7.1 to 0.10.0 I have problems when running 
Heritrix without the GUI

I used to simply start the crawler with

$HERITRIX_HOME/bin/heritrix -n order.xml

the paths in order.xml where all relative to the placement of the order.xml

when I do the same now the paths specified in order.xml are calculated 
relatively to the root of my filesystem which means that the crawler 
tries to save files in:
/arcs
/logs
/state
/checkpoint

If I specify absolut paths in the order.xml everything runs fine !

And now for the question - do I miss any setting / configuration to 
obtain the old style path-calculating - or is this a new practice ?

best
Bjarne Andersen
